title: UPDATE| Male victim found with gunshot wound to the head
content:
6:30 p.m.
CLEARWATER S.C. (WRDW/WAGT) -- The Aiken County Sheriff's Office confirms a gunshot wound victim found earlier today was self-inflicted.
The man was found with a gunshot wound on 244 Parker Drive and taken to the hospital. No one else was injured.
2:10 p.m.
CLEARWATER S.C. (WRDW/WAGT) -- Aiken County officials say the male victim was found with a gunshot wound to the head.
The victim was transported to the hospital. Officials said he was in the car with several other people. No one is in custody at this time. The shooting is still under investigation.
1:48 p.m.
Friday, Feb. 26, 2016
CLEARWATER S.C. (WRDW/WAGT) -- The Aiken County Sheriff's office says they are on scene of a shooting on 244 Parker Drive.
Parker Drive is off Jefferson Davis Highway in Clearwater. Officials said it was originally dispatched as an accidental shooting but they believe there could be more to it.
We have a crew on the way and will update you as soon as more information comes in.
